name: TurnTack (itch)
description:
Over View

There was a Nahuatl  myth of the creation that a mortal world lasts for four thousand years, then perishes.

The world did indeed perish, and recreated for four times.

On the fifth world, another myth about the Light passed on through murals.

The world once again enters the period of destruction.

Flah, the girl with shining hair, is hunted as an offering.

She flees.

GamePlay

Move: A, D.
Jump: Press space-bar.
Interaction: E

Enteract with objects by using keyboard button E, though it won’t be needed at this Demo.

Platform

TurnTack will be released on Steam around the end of July 2020.

It was released on the very same platform in December of 2018, but decided the gameplay was unenjoyable, making us to recreate the game from the scratch.

Take in mind that the current version and the Steam version are completely different games.

Any feedbacks regarding the game will be welcome.

 Thank you.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window7 64-bit
  • Processor: intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space ( real capacity: 1.66GB)
  • Additional Notes: SSE4.2 Required
